DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the feasibility (acceptability) of a consultation dedicated to informing women about their risk of breast cancer and the screening methods recommended for them according to the recommendations in force during a routine consultation at a general practitioner, a gynecologist or a radiologist.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility of Breast Cancer Risk Evaluation in Women From the General Population
DOC.criteria: Woman from 40 to 74 years old Understanding the French language Women will not be eligible for study if they are in any of the following situations: Cancer active or in the course of treatment type surgery, chemotherapy, or radiotherapy, whether breast or other organ Recent diagnosis <1 year of suspicious or cancerous lesions Psychiatric pathology not compatible with the study Poor understanding of the French language
